name: Espresso Macchiato
instructions:
1.Prepare some milk froth using the Aeroccino milk frother or the steampipe of your Nespresso machine
2.Prepare a capsule of either Roma, Master Origin India or Volluto Coffee in Espresso (40 ml / 135 oz) and add sugar if desired
3.Top the Espresso with a little frothed milk
4.For a milder taste, add more milk froth
5.Sprinkle with chocolate flakes if desire
